This unique cabinet design eliminates disorganized and missing supplies. The clearly labeled compartments create a cabinet that is easy to use and restock. With the expansion pocket, you can customize your cabinet to meet your specific needs. Also, the SmartTab ezRefill System is a simple but effective way for reordering and restocking, which is why it revolutionizes the replenishment process. It is quick, easy, and cost effective.
